title: President pays tribute to martyrs of Gwadar helicopter crash
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sept 09 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi has contacted the bereaved families of shuhada who were martyred during a helicopter crash in Gwadar on September 4 and paid tribute to their sacrifices.
The president held telephonic conversations with the bereaved families of late Lt. Commander Jawad Ali Shah and Hamza Abid and expressed his condolences, President Secretariat Press Wing said in a press release on Saturday.
He also condoled with the family of shaheed Hasnain Haider, technician.
The president said that the nation would always remember the sacrifices of shuhada and their families.
On the occasion, he also prayed for the high ranks of the martyrs and for their families to bear the losses with fortitude.
